text:
We were born in different homes, we grew up in different
worlds, and if it were true, we might never have met.
I don't even know what happens to us after this.
I am infinitely in love with the "now" that we are talking about.

I just keep walking, praying that it will go on
forever and ever...

Thank you all for your hard work...!
This concludes all scenes and filming...!

Thank you for your hard work, Sakuragi-san...!
We got to talk a lot and I feel like we made a great drama!

You you did a great job with the shoot, and I look forward to
working with you again when the opportunity arises.
...Thank you for your hard work, Producer-san

...The last scene was full of excitement.
I look forward to the finished product.
Are you sad that the shooting is over?

...But thanks to everyone, I was able to do my best.
I received a lot of nice words...

─ I feel like I can't wait to start my next job...
and I feel like I want to start running...

Well, I'll have to bring in a job that Mano
feels the same way about next time.

Mano, great work at the shoot...! ／
Mano! Thanks for your hard work!"
